author: Justine Calma
title: The COVID-19 pandemic is generating tons of medical waste
description: A surge in COVID-19 patients also means a rise in medical waste that could carry the novel coronavirus. Sanitation workers are preparing for the piles of trash and will need appropriate personal protective equipment like gloves and masks.
content:
Sanitation workers need personal protective equipment too
A staff member collects and transfers medical waste at the Henan Provincial Peoples Hospital in Zhengzhou, central Chinas Henan Province, March 3, 2020. 
Xinhua/Hao Yuan via Getty Images
